lsystem.util

Class LUT2

  • java.lang.Object
    • lsystem.util.LUT2

  • public final class LUT2
extends java.lang.Object
    Lookup table for degree cosine/sine, has a fixed precision ca. 0.25 degrees
    Author:
    Martin Prout

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static float cos(float thet)
      Look up cos for the passed angle in degrees, fixed precision, no better than 0.25 degree with some scope for errors.
      static float cosLut(float thet)
      Look up cos for the passed angle in radians, fixed precision, no better than 0.25 degree with some scope for errors.
      static void initialize()
      Initialise sin table with values (first quadrant only) Save a bit of space by storing as float
      static float sin(float thet)
      Look up sine for the passed angle in degrees.
      static float sinLut(float thet)
